title: American Music Awards 2019: Complete list of nominations
text:
The American Music Awards take place next month, and the nominees were revealed Thursday morning.

Rapper Post Malone earned seven nods, the most of any musician, including Artist of the Year.

Ariana Grande and Billie Eilish each racked up six nominations, including Artist of the Year and New Artist of the Year, respectively, and Lil Nas X and Taylor Swift picked up five each.

The American Music Awards will take place Sunday, Nov. 24, at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. The ceremony will air on ABC.

ARTIST OF THE YEAR

Drake

Ariana Grande

Halsey

Post Malone

Taylor Swift

NEW ARTIST OF THE YEAR

Luke Combs

Billie Eilish

Lil Nas X

Lizzo

Ella Mai

Lady Gaga & Bradley Cooper "Shallow"

Lil Nas X ft. Billy Ray Cyrus "Old Town Road"

Marshmello & Bastille "Happier"

Shawn Mendes & Camila Cabello "Señorita"

Post Malone & Swae Lee "Sunflower (Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse)"

TOUR OF THE YEAR

BTS

Ariana Grande

Elton John

P!nk

Ed Sheeran

description: Post Malone leads with seven nods; Ariana Grande and Billie Eilish each got six.
